title: Eddard "Ned" Stark
content: Eddard "Ned" Stark of House Stark, Lord of Winterfell and Warden of the North, becomes the Hand of the King after Lord Jon Arryn's death.

title: Robert Baratheon
content: Robert Baratheon of House Baratheon, formerly a fierce warrior, became King of the Seven Kingdoms after leading a rebellion against Aerys II Targaryen.

title: Jaime Lannister
content: Ser Jaime of House Lannister is a member of the Kingsguard and an exceptionally skilled swordsman.

title: Catelyn Stark
content: Catelyn Stark of House Stark and House Tully (n√©e Tully), Lady of Winterfell, is the wife of Lord Eddard Stark.
